availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William D. Marlow (Caldwell co., kentucky, drug store clerk)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, drug store clerk. Tennessee native. Son of Stephen Marlow and Allie Marlow. Married to Pauline Marlow. Father of Molly Marlow and Emma Marlow. Student in Robertson County, Tennessee, in 1850. Drug store clerk in Princeton,Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Robertson County, District 9, p. 75B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 29.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 512A.
"Dr W. D. Marlow (1839-1933)," Memorial #92336849, Find A Grave, accessed July 1, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/92336849.
